name: mcp-wordpress
description: Comprehensive WordPress management through 59 MCP tools with multi-site support, performance monitoring, and intelligent caching
long_description:
# WordPress MCP Server

A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for WordPress management through the WordPress REST API v2. Features 59 WordPress management tools across 10 categories, multi-site support, intelligent caching system with 50-70% performance improvement, real-time performance monitoring, and production-ready security.

## Key Features

- **59 WordPress Management Tools** across Posts, Pages, Media, Users, Comments, Taxonomies, Site Management, Authentication, Cache Management, and Performance Monitoring
- **Multi-Site Support** - Manage multiple WordPress sites from one configuration
- **Intelligent Caching System** - 50-70% performance improvement with multi-layer caching
- **Real-Time Performance Monitoring** - Comprehensive metrics and analytics
- **Flexible Authentication** - Supports App Passwords, JWT, Basic Auth, API Key
- **100% TypeScript** - Complete type safety and IntelliSense
- **Production Ready** - Security-reviewed and battle-tested

## Authentication Methods

- **Application Passwords** (Recommended) - WordPress 5.6+ built-in
- **JWT Authentication** - Requires JWT plugin
- **Basic Authentication** - Development only
- **API Key Authentication** - Requires plugin

## Use Cases

- Content management and publishing workflows
- Multi-site WordPress administration
- Media library management and optimization
- User and comment moderation
- Performance monitoring and optimization
- Automated WordPress maintenance tasks

prompts.name: setup_wordpress
prompts.description: Initial WordPress site setup and configuration. Test authentication, get site information, explore available tools, and receive configuration recommendations.
prompts.text:
Help me set up and configure my WordPress site using the MCP WordPress tools. Please:
1. Test the connection and authentication
2. Get site information and current settings
3. Show me the available tools and their capabilities
4. Provide recommendations for optimal configuration

prompts.name: content_management
prompts.description: WordPress content creation and management workflow. Show recent content, create new posts/pages, manage categories and tags, and optimize media uploads.
prompts.text:
I need help managing content on my WordPress site. Please:
1. Show me recent posts and pages
2. Help me create new content with proper SEO optimization
3. Manage categories and tags for better organization
4. Optimize media uploads and file management

prompts.name: performance_optimization
prompts.description: WordPress performance monitoring and optimization. Check performance metrics, analyze cache hit rates, and get optimization recommendations.
prompts.text:
Help me optimize my WordPress site's performance. Please:
1. Check current performance metrics and statistics
2. Analyze cache performance and hit rates
3. Provide optimization recommendations
4. Monitor and alert on performance issues

prompts.name: multi_site_management
prompts.description: Multi-site WordPress administration workflow. Check status of all sites, synchronize content, monitor performance across sites, and manage users consistently.
prompts.text:
I'm managing multiple WordPress sites. Please help me:
1. Check the status of all configured sites
2. Perform multi-site management tasks
3. Monitor performance across all sites
4. Manage users and permissions consistently
